values: yeahh soo..i miss everyone from here.

hey guys its NEW YEARS EVE! well i am supposed to go to this show on the ship about now but i realized i have to do major getting ready. hmm i think im going to wear my homecoming dress tonight. ah im already so amazingly hyperactive from finished a whole bottle of cruzan dark rum with carly ah im getting lucky tonight =] fuck. in st.martin i bought a bottle of hypnotiq and they took it away until moi gets off the ship. fuck fuck fuck i bought it 0nly for tonight and those bitches take it away.. =[ hmm 2 nights ago was interesting. its so funny that on a cruise you can totally be with a guy one night and then the next they'd totally like be with someone else. well its actually kinda weird too but people shouldnt be getting feelings for one another on a cruise anyway. tonight hopefully will be exciting. hopefully i get lucky again ;] hey its a cruise does it really matter. everyone should have a good new years and im coming back in 3 days bitches!! okay i really should go now.

I LOVE YOU ALL!

leaving for the train to miami..WISH ME LUCK! won't be on till like what the 3rd? but if you really want to talk to me. call me.. ESPECIALLY YOU KRIS! 

and to everyone. <font size="+2"><font color="#ff0000">HAPPY</font> <font color="#008000">HOLIDAYS</font>!</font>

love you<3

soo wow i still dont have a fucking phone.but im living.. and i still <3 caroline. ITS NOT HER FAULT! so yeah clubbingg really was fun in reality. had ALOT of fun with c, mike, joe, and rory. [the only people we actually knew] saturday last time for a long time hanging with stacie. REALLY SAD that shes moving. ive known her since first grade and even though we sortah went our seperate ways in high school, i still <3 her crazy amounts! yeah so had alot of fun with saying our last goodbyes to her. then woke up at 11 realizing i was seeing southcott that day! so went home and then picked up kristen. we chizzed in nyack for a while. had good talks. went to my fav place in nyack-the pier..theres something about it. i <3 the view i guess? yeah so watched southcott play and they were amazing. they are my fav local band EVERRR. saw nikki..and then saw how shannons car got in an accidnet on mountain view and realized my slutt nikki was in there. i was like WHATTT?! [hope your okay] okay..so this weeks been soo slowww. heres a few pictures from a really long time ago [labor day weekend, was it?] and a little from the summer.. these are my favoritest people ever! CHIPINAW I FUCKING LOVE YOU! OH, WARNING: i look like total shit in these. THE LAST DAY OF CAMP. rubin, hallie, tuzzi, amy + rob, robbie, j. blum, laz and me LABOR DAY WEEKEND. at tuzzis.[GOOD TIMES] me, amy, emily, laz, tuzzi,hallie, lani, jill sola, tuzzi, jill, laz, emily,hallie,me +lani before clubbing at CHROME. amy, joey, emily, me, tuzzi, robbie and jill [AFTER I WAS FUCKING TOWELED] matt beating the shit outta joey AT CAMP? my sexxyyyyyy adam!! i <3 you who i've liked this whole summer. tell me i have bad taste. come on i dare you! =P

Alotta pictures in this entry =] on wednesday me laurz and lauren were supposed to go clubbing again. but we skipped. and we ended having a kick ass time too! hahah I LOVE NORTHS SENIORS!! tonight im going out with a bunch of people to nyack.. o baby =] well i really have to get ready soon so here are the pictures..their from blumberg's and lauren's camera tuzzi me blumberg andd amyy! <3 me and myyy babii jess me my dad and my brother? amy and tuzz! blumberg and amzz now onto the sexyy ones of wednesday night.. whoa a normal picture of us? piggy back ride anyone? ouch [my butt hurt after that] ..those SSEXY abercrombie models.. hmm..me and lauren and then laurz eye hi my name is chubby. me lauren and laurz ouch my butt!you guys are animals! laurz and i me being ghetto not so normal.. ok im either a rabbi..a russian women..my grandma.. a new born baby. i was sooo sugar higgh we'd be sexy boys.. hahahah look at my hot hat awww im loved <3 THE END. <3

back from camp eveyrone!! =[ miss it so much..well ive been back for like 4 days..well anyways camp was abs. amazing and i miss every minute of it..well now wut am i doing the rest of the summer? working as a CIT at candy mountain day camp..ya starting 2morow. heres a few pics i found online..as i find more ill add them on bheres a few: my fav. conselor nicola and her side of the bunk mike sahlor! hes from suffern..i liked him the 1st week..until i found out he was with sum bitchy waitress rite to left-josh talbert, JEREMY FREIHLING [BABYDUKES] who i liked and still do, and hamburger[zak] HOT CA!!! HOTTTTTTTTTTTIE left to rite-david calmus[wheres my food biatch], brett, and david pearlman[who liked me but i didnt like him] left to rite-sum kid, the pimps of all pimps [waiters conselor],perry,joey[mouskateer, matt[rosenchod] bff left to rite- blumberg, ew me, laz, amy [[ppl from my bunk]] MY WHOLE BUNK..left to rite-amy, me, blumberg, laz, hallie, tuzzi, and rubin on the bottom MISS U GUYS SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO MUCH!

Yesterday well it sucked..jess ditched us to go shopping with her fkn cuzins..on kris's bday and my last day. so we all got mad at her and theyre still mad..but um me arielle manda n kris decided to jus go shopping and eat dinner so we did and i got a von bitch shirt =] and then we figured we shud jus go home cuz we spent all our money so we went 2 kris's house..looked in syds mailbox for the cd cudnt find it..and then at like 11 we went 2 deligios house..i made a complete fool outta myself i saw this guy jeremy that i knew from camp ramaquouis and so iw as like OMG JEREMY? and he sed yeah..i was like heyyy its jill from camp ramaquois! hes liek i dont remember u lol it was soo embarrassing but it WAS HIM. yeah then got home and sed goodbye to kris. 2day im officially going to chipinaw..the bus will be picking a buncha ppl up at 3 at the nanuet mall..then i will be sitting with blumberg for 2 hours. i hope all of you guys have a safe summer and i kno imma be missing alotta action but plz dont hesitate to write me
Jillian Hilowitz 52 Silver Lake Rd. Swan Lake, NY 12783
 If u dont know that im away and decide to take me off your friends list. I guess you didnt read much.. Ill miss you all i love you guys sooo much ill be back on the 23rd of july.. throw a party for me =] hehe bbyee LOVE U GUYS
